text: Uganda competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Uganda entered four swimmers. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Atuhaire Ambala |align=left|50 m freestyle |24.69 |=86 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m freestyle |53.89 |89 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Tendo Mukalazi |align=left|50 m backstroke |29.70 |64 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m breaststroke |32.64 |65 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Women {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font- size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Selina Katumba |align=left|100 m freestyle |1:03.88 |=76 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|50 m butterfly |32.77 |57 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left rowspan=2|Avice Meya |align=left|50 m freestyle |29.49 |75 |colspan=4|Did not advance |- |align=left|100 m butterfly |1:19.69 |51 |colspan=4|Did not advance |} ;Mixed {|class=wikitable style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |-align=center |align=left|Atuhaire Ambala Selina Katumba Tendo Mukalazi Avice Meya |align=left|4 × 100 m mixed freestyle relay |4:00.09 |31 |colspan=2|Did not advance |-align=center |align=left| |align=left|4 × 100 m mixed medley relay |colspan=2| |colspan=2|Did not advance |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Uganda at the World Aquatics Championships World Aquatics Championships
title: Uganda at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
